com.thomsonreuters.ema.access

Interface OmmXml

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComplexType, Data

    public interface OmmXml
extends ComplexType
    OmmXml represents XML data format in Omm.

    Method string() can have performance decrease, since it will trigger garbage collection.

    Objects of this class are intended to be short lived or rather transitional.
    This class is designed to efficiently perform setting and extracting of XML and its content.
    Objects of this class are not cache-able.
